data.name: SONOKUNI
data.detailed_description:
Instantly resurrected by the power of God! Repeatedly challenging A loop of violence in which a single blow kills and is killed.
There are only three actions to use: attack, parry, and throw.
Enjoy logical and deep strategy with various enemies and complex room structures.
Over 150 levels in more than 10 stages, keep searching for the fastest route to clear!

The world of Japanese mythology with advanced biotechnology.
Takeru, the hero of the game, becomes an assassin to protect his dying country.
Can he protect his country and culture with violence? Takeru struggles to find a new answer.
Country/Life/DNA/Culture/Lore. What should be protected? What makes a soul?
What will become of SONOKUNI? Let's see how it ends together with Takeru, the main character.

【Game design】
The game is designed to be played as a hardcore action game, with repeated revivals.
Aim for the fastest time: Speed Run function is implemented to compete for the clearing time. Aim for the top with various rules.
Intuitive controls: Three actions (attack/guard/slow) allow anyone to play intuitively. An immersive experience.
The seven enemy types and complex room structures allow players to enjoy different strategies even in the same stage. There is more than one route of attack.
Massive battles: More than 10 stages with over 150 levels. Multiple powerful bosses to battle.

【Contents】
Dope music and pixel art: Developed by "DON YASA CREW," a J-HIPHOP group that also performs as a J-HipHop group. The game's background music is all original Japanese rap music, and the unique pixel-art world is a delight to play.
A thought-provoking story: The protagonist, an assassin who becomes an assassin to protect a dying country, struggles to find a new solution.
A story based on Japanese mythology and a bio-science fiction worldview: The game combines a story based on Japanese mythology with a bio-science fiction worldview. The story expresses the problems faced by an advanced society.
EASY function to focus on the story: The game can be set to enhance the ability to slow down in order to clear the story.

data.short_description: "SONOKUNI" is a hardcore high-speed action game. In a world of bio-science fiction and Japanese mythology, manipulate time and space to protect your dying country from the forces of a superpower. This experience is truly HIPHOP as you continue to struggle for a solution other than violence.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 (2 * 2000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS (512 MB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
